column4: I just did a clean install of 8.10 and am getting a grub error 2 (I did the clean install to try to fix a grub error 15), I'm thinking it might be a dying HD as they are really old, are there any tools that will rigorously test all 3 HDs off a live-cd?
all hard drive manufacturers provide tools for testing their hard drives
does the ubuntu live-cd have anything built in?
nothing as good as the manufacturer tools
